name: Day of Reaper
description:
this was a small project I did in 2 days for a friend’s birthday in 2020

despite not having much in the project so far, I am very happy to have done it, I still intend to improve this project in the future

my friend's twitter: @NewTioSans

GAME

the game consists of killing the halloween spirits that haunt you

the more you kill, the more points you get

get as many points as possible before your lives are over

CONTROLS

Arrow Keys - move

X - attack
